page.title: 07HOME LIFE_A CHILD'S DAY_
page.content: I get up at 10 or 20 past 8 most mornings.I hurry into the bathroom and get washed and brush my teeth.After that I hurry and get dressed and go downstairs for my breakfast.Usually my mam and brother are having their breakfast so mine is ready as well. After breakfast I comb my hair and put my shoes and my coat on then go down to school.I walk to school with my brother.When I get into the school yard I usually play football.After the bell goes I get into my class line then wait for the teacher to send us into school.In class we do maths first then after play we do English.Then I go home for my dinner.I come back to school at about 12.50.I play football, then when the bell goes I go back into school for the afternoon session.After that I go home,have my tea, play till 8.30 then go to bed and read.
